text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/ef6746f637adbdb6860b4fa0266c43c49fa498bc|patch 8.2.1019: mapping <M-S-a> does not work in the GUI>
patch 8.2.1019: mapping  does not work in the GUI

Problem:    Mapping  does not work in the GUI.
Solution:   Move the logic to remove the shift modifier to
            may_remove_shift_modifier() and also use it in the GUI.

attachments.title: patch 8.2.1019: mapping  does not work in the GUI · vim/vim@ef6746f

            Remove unreachable code.

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/3b74b6b4bb9a022f8c6f6e544360d628e10df1ab|patch 8.2.1012: Vim9: cannot declare single character script variables>
patch 8.2.1012: Vim9: cannot declare single character script variables

Problem:    Vim9: cannot declare single character script variables.
Solution:   Don't see "b:", "s:", etc. as namespace.  Fix item size of
            sn_var_vals.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1012: Vim9: cannot declare single character script variables · vim/vim@3b74b6b
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1012: Vim9: cannot declare single character script variables · vim/vim@3b74b6b
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: cannot declare single character script variables. Solution: Don't see "b:", "s:", etc. as namespace. Fix item size of sn_var_vals.

patch 8.2.1013: channel tests can be a bit flaky

Problem:    Channel tests can be a bit flaky.
Solution:   Set the g:test_is_flaky flag in SetUp().

attachments.text: Problem: Channel tests can be a bit flaky. Solution: Set the g:test_is_flaky flag in SetUp().

Solution:   Rename to "end".

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/20298ce679dbf21c07c8fe2161724a12424f1e69|patch 8.2.1015: popup filter gets key with modifier prepended>
patch 8.2.1015: popup filter gets key with modifier prepended

Problem:    Popup filter gets key with modifier prepended when using
            modifyOtherKeys.
Solution:   Remove the shift modifier when it is included in the key, also
            when the Alt or Meta modifier is used.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1015: popup filter gets key with modifier prepended · vim/vim@20298ce
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1015: popup filter gets key with modifier prepended · vim/vim@20298ce
attachments.text: Problem: Popup filter gets key with modifier prepended when using modifyOtherKeys. Solution: Remove the shift modifier when it is included in the key, also when the Alt...
